casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Steven Leon HEFLIN, Appellant. WD 80145 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: January 30, 2018 Christian Lehmberg, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Christine Lesicko, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Victor C. Howard, and Karen King Mitchell, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Steven L. Heflin appeals his conviction by a Cole County jury of stealing. The court sentenced him to three years in the Department of Corrections as a prior and persistent offender.

For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
